entry.title: Himars Transform the Battle for Ukraine---and Modern Warfare
entry.content: The mobile, high-precision U.S. rocket system is thwarting Russia’s invasion as it revolutionizes military strategy.

entry.title: Biden Warns of Growing Nuclear Risk as Ukraine Slams Russia for Drone Use
entry.content: President Biden warned that the risk of a nuclear conflict was at its highest since the 1962 Cuban missile crisis as Russia continued to face setbacks on the battlefields of Ukraine.

entry.title: After Thailand Mass Shooting, Families Grieve Loss of Children
entry.content: The rampage that left 36 people dead at a child-care center in the country’s northeast has shattered a rural community.
